content: in a civil case the vilnius city district court made a decision regarding a legal dispute between two parties the defendant is responsible for paying certain fees while the applicant is responsible for paying court fees the court resolved a matrimonial property case granting the applicant the car the text discusses compensation obligations related to matrimonial property and the distribution of jointly owned assets the claimant filed for divorce seeking various claims including child maintenance and a motor vehicle as compensation the court considered factors such as the childs age and living situation in determining the childs residence the court awarded the claimant the motor vehicle and ordered the defendant to pay compensation and legal costs the court granted custody to the mother and ordered the father to pay compensation and legal costs the vilnius county state tax inspectorate is requesting payment from the applicant for procedural document costs
